ChunkText: the career center gives advice on how to look for an on-campus job in the site but please note these are competitive and many students dont find an on-campus job until their second semester, if they are looking. happy job hunting!
ContextBefore: when you receive your first job offer, you will need to apply for a social security number ssn if you dont already have one. an ssn is required to be paid in the us. to learn more about what an ssn is and how to apply, please review the information in this website .
